articles.content: Here is Ron Howards decent retelling of an amazing true-life story: the Tham Luang cave rescue in northern Thailand in 2018, when international volunteers and Thai Navy Seals battled to rescue 12 tee… [+3143 chars]

articles.content: Midway through Phoebe Bridgers celebratory and cathartic Manchester Apollo gig, she addresses her 3,500 disciples, with palpable feeling. You know when people are like stick to the music and shut up … [+3270 chars]

articles.title: How we made Breakout by Swing Out Sister: ‘The record label hated it. It wasn’t cool to be upbeat’ - The Guardian
articles.description: ‘I tried to record the vocal at home during the night but my flatmate told me to shut up because she had work the next morning’
articles.content:
